# Pre demo clean:
ensure act built and on path, python 64 on path
cd AutomaticComponentToolkit
git reset --hard
rm -r Examples/Primes/LibPrimes_component/Implementations/Cpp/_build
clear

# Go to example dir
cd Examples/Primes/

# Show interface file
vim libPrimes.xml

# Generate component
act libPrimes.xml

# Show generated files
note: this one we filled in earlier.
cd LibPrimes_component
find Bindings
find Implementations
find Examples

# Build component
cd LibPrimes_component/Implementations/Cpp
mkdir _build
cd _build
cmake ..
cmake --build .

# There it is
ls Debug

# Go to example
cd ../../../Examples/Python

# Walk through example script.
vim LibPrimes_Example.py

# Run example. tada!
python LibPrimes_Example.py
